padding--b-none.title: No bottom padding
padding--b-none.description: Removes all padding from the bottom.

padding--b-xs.title: Tiny bottom padding
padding--b-xs.description: Adds a tiny amount of padding to the bottom.

padding--b-sm.title: Small bottom padding
padding--b-sm.description: Adds a small amount of padding to the bottom.

padding--b-md.title: Medium bottom padding
padding--b-md.description: Adds a medium amount of padding to the bottom.

padding--b-lg.title: Large bottom padding
padding--b-lg.description: Adds a large amount of padding to the bottom.

padding--b-xl.title: Extra-large bottom padding
padding--b-xl.description: Adds an extra-large amount of padding to the bottom.

padding--b-xxl.title: Double-extra-large bottom padding
padding--b-xxl.description: Adds a double-extra-large amount of padding to the bottom.
